entry.title: WIND WARNING ENDED, Percé
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:35 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Blowing snow this evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 in Forillon Park this evening. Wind becoming light after midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
